title: Disable pytorch.org/api ?
body_html:
Sometims pytorch.org/api/0.1.4 or 0.1.3 would come up in Google search instead of pytorch.org/docs creating confusion.

I hope PyTorch won't go OpenCV's path with many outdated version of documentation still online on official website and coming up in Google :) (docs of 2.4.11 and 3.0-beta still come up often, when the latest release is 3.2)
body_text:
Sometims pytorch.org/api/0.1.4 or 0.1.3 would come up in Google search instead of pytorch.org/docs creating confusion.
I hope PyTorch won't go OpenCV's path with many outdated version of documentation still online on official website and coming up in Google :) (docs of 2.4.11 and 3.0-beta still come up often, when the latest release is 3.2)
body:
Sometims `pytorch.org/api/0.1.4` or 0.1.3 would come up in Google search instead of `pytorch.org/docs` creating confusion.

I hope PyTorch won't go OpenCV's path with many outdated version of documentation still online on official website and coming up in Google :) (docs of 2.4.11 and 3.0-beta still come up often, when the latest release is 3.2)
